author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا ملأ الأرض اعلموا أن أوامري سرج عنايتي بين عبادي ومفاتيح رحمتي لبريّتي كذلك نزّل الأمر من سمآء مشيّة ربّكم مالك الأديان لو يجد أحد حلاوة البيان الّذي ظهر من فم مشيّة الرّحمن لينفق ما عنده ولو يكون خزآئن الأرض كلّها ليثبت أمرا من أوامره المشرقة من أفق العناية والألطاف
translation: O ye peoples of the world! Know assuredly that My commandments are the lamps of My loving providence among My servants, and the keys of My mercy for My creatures. Thus hath it been sent down from the heaven of the Will of your Lord, the Lord of Revelation. Were any man to taste the sweetness of the words which the lips of the All-Merciful have willed to utter, he would, though the treasures of the earth be in his possession, renounce them one and all, that he might vindicate the truth of even one of His commandments, shining above the dayspring of His bountiful care and loving-kindness.
